meta.name: description
meta.content: The Multnomah County Elections Division conducts all local, city, county, state and federal elections for the citizens of Multnomah County.
The Multnomah County Elections Division conducts all local, city, county, state and federal elections for the citizens of Multnomah County.

div.div: Not finding a county service? Browse our full list of services
Not finding a department? Browse our full list of departments

li.a: View agenda and past board meetings

p.a: Multnomah County Elections holiday closure date

div.p: I want to...register to vote...cancel my registration...change my address...view election results...[more tasks]

img.alt: voter inside of vehicle drops off ballot at drive up official ballot drop box

figcaption.span: Information on the November 5, 2024 General Election

div.class: views-slideshow-cycle2-main-frame-row views_slideshow_cycle2_slide views_slideshow_slide views-row-2 views_slideshow_cycle2_hidden views-row-even

img.alt: Person with the thumbs up hand right signal standing next to Multnomah County elections official ballot box with signage that reads official ballot box

figcaption.span: Information about Ranked Choice Voting (RCV) for City of Portland candidate contests (Nov. 2024) and for Multnomah County candidate contests (Nov. 2026)

div.class: views-slideshow-cycle2-main-frame-row views_slideshow_cycle2_slide views_slideshow_slide views-row-3 views_slideshow_cycle2_hidden views-row-odd

img.alt: The County conducted a dayslong event to test and refine policies and procedures for hand-counting a recount for a multi-winner RCV election. The recount used test ballots for example candidates.

figcaption.span: Multnomah County Elections completes nations first test hand count...
Regional and national experts joined the 5-day exercise another step in a series of preparations for the Nov. 5, 2024, election, when ranked-choice voting makes its debut on City of Portland ballots

div.class: views-slideshow-cycle2-main-frame-row views_slideshow_cycle2_slide views_slideshow_slide views-row-4 views_slideshow_cycle2_hidden views-row-even

img.alt: Sample of ranked-choice voting ballot for Portland Mayor
img.title: Sample of ranked-choice voting ballot for Portland Mayor

figcaption.span: NEWS RELEASE: Multnomah County Elections releases video explaining...
Voters in the City of Portland will see a difference in the way their ballots look. Candidate contests will now feature a grid that allows voters to rank up to six candidates in order of preference.

a.span: Multnomah County Elections completes nations first test hand...
NEWS RELEASE: Multnomah County Elections releases video...

div.class: view view-related-content view-id-related_content view-display-id-block block-card-content related clearfix view-dom-id-457d363109ae4545be24f06fab509ef0

div.p: 503-988-VOTE (8683) / elections@multco.us / 1040 SE Morrison St., Portland, OR 97214 / Mon-Fri, 8 AM - 5 PM

img.alt: voter dropping ballot at drop site

h2.a: Information for Voters - Multnomah County Elections

div.p: Registration Ballot Tracking and Replacements Official Ballot Drop Sites and more
Multnomah County Elections Voter Education and Outreach Program
Assistance for voters with disabilities: Get assistance and access supports in your home, at a hospital or care facility, or at the elections office.

h2.a: Information for candidates, campaigns & jurisdictions in Multnomah County

div.p: Election Laws and Rules Current and Upcoming Elections Filing Instructions and more

h2.a: Language Access for Voters Needing Interpretation

div.p: Language assistance in any language, including Spanish, Vietnamese, Russian, Ukrainian, Chinese, Somali, Arabic, Korean, Tagalog, and Japanese.
Information and resources on campaign finance and disclosure for Multnomah County Candidates and information on campaign finance.

img.alt: Information on Initiative, Referendum and Recall Petitions

h2.a: Join the Multnomah County Elections Team!

div.p: Are you interested in On Call elections work? Use this form to express interest in working for Multnomah County Elections as an On Call elections worker.
